CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
NC           	NONRETRACT CONVENTIONAL          	NONRTRCT CONVNTIONAL      
NT           	NONRETRACT TRICYCLE              	NONRETRACT TRICYCLE        
RC           	RETRACT CONVENTIONAL             	RETRACT CONVENTIONAL       
RT           	RETRACT TRICYCLE                 	RETRACT TRICYCLE          
99999        	INVALID LANDING GEAR TYPE
